description:
Thousands of activities, expert-curated lessons, and fun learning – all in one. ABCmouse provides the perfect start to your child’s education with a research-validated program that helps your child learn and progress. Unlock learning pathways, earn rewards, and even create your own customizable avatar. ABCmouse makes learning fulfilling and fun!

Chosen by over 45 million families worldwide, ABCmouse delivers 10,000+ exciting Learning Activities for early learning. From STEM subjects to reading, art, social studies, and more – your child can grow in all subjects. It’s not just parents that love ABCmouse. Over 650,000 classrooms and nearly half of all U.S. public libraries trust ABCmouse to bring safe and accessible learning to students.

Kids can have fun improving their reading and their understanding of math and science with different levels, over 850 lessons, and thousands of activities tailored to them. Our Step-by-Step Learning Path fosters independent education and helps your child advance on their terms. Choose from countless books, videos, puzzles, printables, and much more – all on ABCmouse.

10,000+ LEARNING ACTIVITIES 
• Kids of all ages can start the educational journey in math, science, reading, music, and much more
• Discover 10 levels, 850+ lessons, and over 10,000 Learning Activities perfect for any child 
• Children can enjoy songs, games, and animations during their learning journey 
• Find over 900 activities in Spanish

TRACK LEARNING PROGRESS 
• Our Learning Path puts children in control of their learning 
• Watch your child’s progress and help them reach the next level of their educational journey 
• Kids can get rewarded for milestones and improving



FUN, CUSTOMIZABLE LEARNING 
• ABCmouse lets kids transform their experience to fit them 
• Children can personalize their Avatar, Room, and more 
• Kids can even get their own furry friend and have fun with My Hamster and Pet Park

THE PERFECT LEARNING APP 
• ABCmouse has the kid-SAFE+ COPPA seal- Your child can progress in a completely safe learning environment, whether using ABCmouse at home or on the go 
• Winner of prestigious Mom's Choice GOLD, Teachers' Choice, and Parents' Choice GOLD Awards

What Parents & Teachers Say 

"On ABCmouse my children are learning to read, they're doing math problems, social studies, science, everything.” . 
—Elementary School Teacher

"I am a first grade teacher, and I think this site is absolutely terrific! There are many engaging activities for a wide variety of academic areas. My 5-year-old twins LOVE it...I can't wait to have ABCmouse in our family for many years! Thank you, from a veteran teacher."—First Grade Teacher and mother of 5–year–old girls.

Download ABCmouse today and give your children the gift of fun, and effective learning!

Works best with: iPhone 12, 11, X, 8, 7; iPad Mini 5(2019), Pro 9.7(2016), Mini 4(2015), Mini 3(2014), Mini 2(2013), Air(2013) 
ABCmouse MAY NOT FULLY support iOS devices not listed above. 

Subscription Options 
This app offers monthly and annual membership options. 
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase 
• Subscription automatically renews until canceled 
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal 
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and may be canceled by visiting user's Account Settings after purchase 
• See ABCmouse-sponsored studies at www.ageoflearning.com/research

See our full Terms & Conditions at: 
http://www.abcmouse.com/tandc 
View our Privacy Policy at: 
http://www.abcmouse.com/privacy
